com.github.dandelion.core.config
Class Configuration

java.lang.Object
  com.github.dandelion.core.config.Configuration

public class Configuration
extends Object

This class holds the Dandelion configuration initialized at server startup and must be accessed through the Dandelion Context.

All configuration present in the DandelionConfig enum are read using a particular strategy. See readConfig(DandelionConfig).

There should be only one instance of this class in the application.

Since:
0.10.0
Author:
Thibault Duchateau

readConfig

public String readConfig(DandelionConfig config)

Reads the given DandelionConfig in order of priority:

  1. System properties have the highest precedence and thus override everything else
  2. Then the filter initialization parameters, coming from the web.xml file
  3. Then the user-defined properties, coming from the dandelion.properties file, if it exists
  4. Finally the default "dev" value of the given DandelionConfig if the DandelionMode.DEVELOPMENT is enabled, otherwise the default "prod" value.

Parameters:
config - The config to read.
Returns:
the value of the given DandelionConfig.
